body_html:
Environment

PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Manjaro Linux
GCC version: (GCC) 8.2.1 20180831
CMake version: version 3.12.1

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] torch                     0.4.1                     <pip>
[conda] torchvision               0.2.1                     <pip>

Additional context

Trying to import torch inside a widget in orange3 project:

anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/h5py/__init__.py:36: FutureWarning: Conversion of the second argument of issubdtype from `float` to `np.floating` is deprecated. In future, it will be treated as `np.float64 == np.dtype(float).type`.
  from ._conv import register_converters as _register_converters
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  expected ) but found 'ident' here:
aten::_addmv(Tensor self, Tensor mat, Tensor vec, *, Scalar beta=1, Scalar alpha=1) -> Tensor
                                                                    ~~~~~~ <--- HERE

Aborted                 (core dumped) python3 -m Orange.canvas

body:
## Environment
```
PyTorch version: 0.4.1
Is debug build: No
CUDA used to build PyTorch: None

OS: Manjaro Linux
GCC version: (GCC) 8.2.1 20180831
CMake version: version 3.12.1

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: No
CUDA runtime version: No CUDA
GPU models and configuration: No CUDA
Nvidia driver version: No CUDA
cuDNN version: No CUDA

Versions of relevant libraries:
[pip] Could not collect
[conda] torch                     0.4.1                     <pip>
[conda] torchvision               0.2.1                     <pip>
```
## Additional context

Trying to import `torch` inside a widget in [orange3](https://github.com/biolab/orange3) project:
```
anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/h5py/__init__.py:36: FutureWarning: Conversion of the second argument of issubdtype from `float` to `np.floating` is deprecated. In future, it will be treated as `np.float64 == np.dtype(float).type`.
  from ._conv import register_converters as _register_converters
terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::runtime_error'
  what():  expected ) but found 'ident' here:
aten::_addmv(Tensor self, Tensor mat, Tensor vec, *, Scalar beta=1, Scalar alpha=1) -> Tensor
                                                                    ~~~~~~ <--- HERE

Aborted                 (core dumped) python3 -m Orange.canvas
```
